input-field.name: browserHistory
input-field.label: Use browser history
input-field.helpText: If enabled the browsers history will be used within the reservation modal allowing the users to navigate with the native controls. Can be disabled when your store is already using the browsers history internally and the modals history conflicts with it.

input-field.name: useGeolocationImmediately
input-field.label: Use Geolocation immediately
input-field.helpText: If enabled, whenever the user opens the store list the browsers geolocation will be requested immediately instead of only after pressing the locate me button.

input-field.name: testMode
input-field.label: Testmode
input-field.helpText: When set to true no buttons will be rendered within the users browser, till the page was once opened with a query parameter like rrTesting=start. A testing session can be stopped by opening the page with rrTesting=end

input-field.name: countries
input-field.label: Countries
input-field.helpText: Set the available countries for the store list search

input-field.name: displayType
input-field.label: Display on product detail page
input-field.helpText: Choose what should be displayed on the product detail page. Reservation button - A button that opens a popup with a store list and the availability of the selected product in these stores. Availability in store - A box that directly shows the availability of the product in the store. The customer has to select a store the first time.

input-field.name: renderLiveInventoryMode
input-field.label: Store selection
input-field.helpText: Only relevant if "Show availability in store" is selected above. Choose how the customer can select his store. Modal - Opens a popup where the customer can search for his store via zip code or geolocation. Also shows address, distance and opening hours if available. Dropdown - A simple dropdown where the customer can choose the store from. Recommended only for small amount of stores.

input-field.name: inventoryHideNumber
input-field.label: Hide stock
input-field.helpText: Hides the stock number and therefore display only if the product is available or not.

input-field.name: inventoryShowExactUntil
input-field.label: Show exact inventory until
input-field.helpText: If inventory is higher than the given number the inventory will be displayed as "X+ Available"

input-field.name: inventoryShowLowUntil
input-field.label: Show low inventory until
input-field.helpText: If inventory is lower than the given number the inventory will be displayed in the state-warning color

input-field.name: termsLink
input-field.label: Terms Link
input-field.helpText: Add an url to the terms and condition page, also enforces the user to accept them before placing an reservation

input-field.name: privacyLink
input-field.label: Privacy Link
input-field.helpText: Add an url to the privacy page, also enforces the user to accept them before placing an reservation

input-field.name: colors
input-field.label: Colors
input-field.helpText: Please use only the 3 numbers of rgb schema. rgb(1,2,3) -> 1,2,3

input-field.name: translations
input-field.label: Translations JSON
input-field.helpText: JSON format. All strings can be found in the github repo
